tips.summary: Try to press your hero power every turn to give yourself the highest odds of finding the good pirates and pairs / triples. The best pirates to get early are Salty Looter and Southsea Strongarm. In the mid game you want to hit Peggy Brittlebone, Cap’n Hoggarr and Tony Two-Tusk. If you can get a golden Cap’n Hoggar and normal one you have almost infinite money and just cycle pirates the rest of the game.
tips.description:
Play pirates, then win!
Easy peasy
